data.title: Guyana: Gabinete
data.text:
Cooperative Republic of Guyana

República Cooperativa de Guyana Cabinet Gabinete

Ultima actualización / Last update: Mar 21, 2011

Prime Minister / Primer Ministro Samuel Hinds 11 Aug 1999

President and Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces /Presidente y Comandante en Jefe de las Fuerzas Armadas Bharrat Jagdeo 11 Aug 1999

Head of the Presidential Secretariat / Jefe de la Secretaría Presidencial Roger F. Luncheon 11 Aug 1999

Ministry of Agriculture / Ministerio de Agricultura Robert Montgomery Persaud 09 Sept 2006 Satyadeow Sawh 11 Aug 1999 09 Aug 2006

Ministry of Amerindian Affairs Pauline Sukhai 04 Jan 2008 Carolyn Rodrigues Apr 2001 04 Jan 2008 Vilbert De Souza Aug 1999 Apr 2001

Ministry of Culture, Youth & Sports / Ministerio de Cultura, Juventud y Deportes Frank Anthony 09 Aug 2006 Anthony Xavier 29 Oct 2005 09 Aug 2006 Gail Teixeira Aug 1999 29 Oct 2005

Ministry of Education / Ministerio de Educación Shaik Baksh 01 Aug 2006 Henry Benfield Jeffrey Mar 2001 01 Aug 2006 Dale Bisnauth Aug 1999 Mar 2001

Ministry of Finance / Ministerio de Finanzas Ashni Kumar Singh 09 Aug 2006 Saisnarine Kowlessar 1999 09 Aug 2006

Ministry of Foreign Affairs / Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores Carolyn Rodrigues-Birkett 04 Jan 2008 Rudy Insanally Mar 2001 04 Jan 2008 Clement Rohee Aug 1999 Mar 2001

Ministry of Health / Ministerio de Salud Leslie Ramsammy

19 Mar 2001

Ministry of Home Affairs / Ministerio del Interior Clement Rohee 09 Sept 2006 Gail Teixeira 31 May 2005 08 Sept 2006 Ronald Gajraj Aug 1999 30 Apr 2005

Ministry of Housing & Water / Ministerio de Vivienda y Agua Irfan Ally 01 Oct 2008 Harry Narine Nawbatt 09 Sept 2006 01 Oct 2008 Shaik Baksh Aug 1999 08 Sept 2006

Ministry of Human Services and Social Security/ Ministerio de Servicios Humanos y Seguridad Social (*) Priya Manickchand 09 Sept 2006 Dale Bisnauth Mar 2001 08 Sept 2006 Clement Rohee Aug 1999 Mar 2001

Ministry of Labour, Human Services and Social Security / Ministerio de Trabajo, Servicios Humanos y Seguridad Social Manzoor Nadir 09 Sept 2006 Henry Jeffrey Aug 1999 08 Sept 2006

Ministry of Legal Affairs / Ministerio de Asuntos Legales Charles R. Ramson 06 Feb 2009 Doodnauth Singh Aug 1999 06 Feb 2009

Ministry of Local Government and Regional Development / Ministerio de Gobierno Local y Desarrollo Regional Kellawan Lall 09 Sept 2006 Harripersaud Nokta Aug 1999 08 Sept 2006

Ministry of Parliamentary Affairs / Ministerio de Asuntos Parlamentarios Reepu Daman Persaud Aug 1999

Ministry of Public Service / Ministerio de Servicio Público Jennifer Westford 08 Sept 2006 George Fung-On Aug 1999 08 Sept 2006

Ministry of Tourism, Industry & Commerce / Ministerio de Turismo, Industria y Comercio Manniram Prashad 09 Sept 2006 Manzoor Nadir Aug 1999 08 Sept 2006

Ministry of Transport and Hydraulics / Ministerio de Transporte Robeson Benn Aug 2006

(*) Merged into Ministry of Labour. The new ministry, though, has two ministers. One responsible for labour issues and the other for human services and social security.
